issue.title: [Format] Add some form of user field metadata to IPC schemas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-301](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-301). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Users may wish to use user-defined types that can be represented as some Arrow primitive type. We should design a mechanism (similar to the key-value metadata in Parquet) to make this possible.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-301?focusedCommentId=15543522) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/154

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-301?focusedCommentId=15543603) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
